meanings.sent1: Her beau brought her flowers on their date.
meanings.sent2: She introduced her beau to her parents last night.
meanings.sent3: The beau surprised her with a romantic picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: His beau's kindness shone brighter than the stars.
meanings.sent5: The young couple's love was evident in the way her beau looked at her.

meanings.sent1: The stylish beau wore a sharp suit to the party.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the most fashionable beau in town.
meanings.sent3: The beau's impeccable taste in clothing turned heads wherever he went.
meanings.sent4: His confidence made him a true beau among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The beau's outfit was so trendy, it set a new fashion standard.

meanings.sent1: The young dandy was considered quite the beau in his social circle.
meanings.sent2: He spent hours perfecting his look to be the ultimate beau.
meanings.sent3: The beau's obsession with fashion sometimes made his friends chuckle.
meanings.sent4: In a room full of ordinary men, he stood out like a beau in a field of daisies.
meanings.sent5: His flair for style made him the beau everyone wanted to emulate.
